ProductInfo.Features:
36 IR illuminators for night vision. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TV lines. Lens: 6.0mm
Built-in audio microphone and built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application. Built-in light sensor controls IR activation
Affordable day night audio video CMOS security camera. NTSC signal system
Package included: 4 of CMOS cameras, 1 of 4 channel power supply and 4 of security warning decals
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Day Night IR Infrared Audio Outdoor Bullet Security Cameras Built-in Microphone IR-Cut Filter 36 Infrared LEDs for CCTV Home Surveillance with 1 of 4 Channel Power Supply and Bonus Security Camera Stickers CC7
